text: Feel Good About Your Body is an EP by American noise rock band Pussy Galore, released in 1985 by Adult Contemporary and Shove Records. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== Adapted from the Feel Good About Your Body liner notes. ;Pussy Galore *Julie Cafritz – electric guitar, backing vocals *John Hammill – drums, percussion *Jon Spencer – lead vocals, electric guitar, percussion ;Production and additional personnel *Barrett Jones – production ==Release history== {|class="wikitable" ! Region ! Date ! Label ! Format ! title: Feel Good About Your Body
